hadiths.text: This tradition has also been transmitted by Sufyan through a different chain of narrators. This version has:He raised his hands once in the beginning. Some narrated: (raised his hands) once only

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ لَمْ يَذْكُرِ الرَّفْعَ عِنْدَ الرُّكُوعِ
chapter.eng-name: Those Who Did Not Mentiong Raisin The Hands After Ruku'
